name: Trzech Wesolych Pielegniarzy
overview: Trzech wesołych pielęgniarzy! is a simple bloody action game. As an ambulance driver the player must deliver wounded patient breaking by crowds of city citizens before the time runs out. To achieve the objective, the driver can drive through pedestrians and throw grenades toward the inhabitants of the blocks. Suitable destruction provides a time bonus. Reaching the hospital area ends the game.
